data.eml:eml: A new species of Stereocyclops Cope (Anura, Microhylidae) from Southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Caramaschi, Ulisses, Salles, Rodrigo De Oliveira Lula, Cruz, Carlos Alberto Gonçalves (2012): A new species of Stereocyclops Cope (Anura, Microhylidae) from Southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 3583: 83-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209912
